Definition: Standard measure of conduction through a material. This value applies to the opaque section of the wall.
Color correction factor for surfaces. From ASHRAE CLTD - 1.0 if dark colored or light in an industrial area. 0.83 if permanently medium colored. 0.65 if permanently light colored.
Rate that outdoor air enters the space through leaky façade elements. Measured in CFM / SF of façade length.
